name: structDelete
description: Removes an element from a structure.

params.name: structure
params.description:
Structure or a variable that contains one. Contains element
 to remove

params.name: indicateNotExisting
params.description: When true this function will return true only if the key that was deleted existed. When false (default) this function will return true if the key is successfully removed.

examples.title: Remove a key from a struct
examples.description: Creates a struct then removes a key

examples.title: Remove a key from a struct using the member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Invoking the delete function on a struct is the same as running structDelete.
